aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access based on the tags associated with the resource

ListDataSourceSyncJobs.description: Grants permission to get Data Source sync job history

ListDataSources.description: Grants permission to list the data sources

ListEntityPersonas.description: Lists specific permissions of users and groups with access to your Amazon Kendra experience

ListExperienceEntities.description: Lists users or groups in your AWS SSO identity source that are granted access to your Amazon Kendra experience

ListExperiences.description: Lists one or more Amazon Kendra experiences. You can create an Amazon Kendra experience such as a search application

ListFaqs.description: Grants permission to list the Faqs

ListGroupsOlderThanOrderingId.description: Grants permission to list groups that are older than an ordering id

ListQuerySuggestionsBlockLists.description: Grants permission to list the QuerySuggestions BlockLists

ListThesauri.description: Grants permission to list the Thesauri

BatchGetDocumentStatus.description: Grants permission to do batch get document status

DescribeDataSource.description: Grants permission to describe a data source

DescribeExperience.description: Gets information about your Amazon Kendra experience such as a search application

DescribeFaq.description: Grants permission to describe an Faq

DescribeIndex.description: Grants permission to describe an Index

DescribePrincipalMapping.description: Grants permission to describe principal mapping from index

DescribeQuerySuggestionsBlockList.description: Grants permission to describe a QuerySuggestions BlockList

DescribeQuerySuggestionsConfig.description: Grants permission to describe the query suggestions configuration for an index

DescribeThesaurus.description: Grants permission to describe a Thesaurus

GetQuerySuggestions.description: Grants permission to get suggestions for a query prefix

ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list tags for a resource

Query.description: Grants permission to query documents and faqs

AssociateEntitiesToExperience.description: Grants permission to put principal mapping in index

AssociatePersonasToEntities.description: Defines the specific permissions of users or groups in your AWS SSO identity source with access to your Amazon Kendra experience

BatchDeleteDocument.description: Grants permission to batch delete document

BatchPutDocument.description: Grants permission to batch put document

ClearQuerySuggestions.description: Grants permission to clear out the suggestions for a given index, generated so far

CreateDataSource.description: Grants permission to create a data source

aws:TagKeys.description: Filters access based on the tag keys that are passed in the request

CreateFaq.description: Grants permission to create an Faq

DeleteDataSource.description: Grants permission to delete a data source

DeleteExperience.description: Deletes your Amazon Kendra experience such as a search application

DeleteFaq.description: Grants permission to delete an Faq

DeleteIndex.description: Grants permission to delete an Index

DeletePrincipalMapping.description: Grants permission to delete principal mapping from index

DeleteQuerySuggestionsBlockList.description: Grants permission to delete a QuerySuggestions BlockList

DeleteThesaurus.description: Grants permission to delete a Thesaurus

DisassociateEntitiesFromExperience.description: Prevents users or groups in your AWS SSO identity source from accessing your Amazon Kendra experience

DisassociatePersonasFromEntities.description: Removes the specific permissions of users or groups in your AWS SSO identity source with access to your Amazon Kendra experience

PutPrincipalMapping.description: Grants permission to put principal mapping in index

StartDataSourceSyncJob.description: Grants permission to start Data Source sync job

StopDataSourceSyncJob.description: Grants permission to stop Data Source sync job

SubmitFeedback.description: Grants permission to send feedback about a query results

UpdateDataSource.description: Grants permission to update a data source

UpdateExperience.description: Updates your Amazon Kendra experience such as a search application

UpdateIndex.description: Grants permission to update an Index

UpdateQuerySuggestionsBlockList.description: Grants permission to update a QuerySuggestions BlockList

UpdateQuerySuggestionsConfig.description: Grants permission to update the query suggestions configuration for an index

UpdateThesaurus.description: Grants permission to update a thesaurus

TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag a resource with given key value pairs
